snippet: Roger Federer was knocked out of the Monte Carlo Masters when he slumped to a 3-6 6-2 7-5 defeat by local favourite Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the quarter-finals on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer was knocked out of the Monte Carlo Masters when he slumped to a 3-6 6-2 7-5 defeat by local favourite Jo-Wilfried Tsonga in the quarter-finals on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Federer Knocked Out by Tsonga in Monte Carlo
headline.main: Federer Knocked Out by Tsonga in Monte Carlo
